entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
